name: slinky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of women's clothes) made of delicate cloth and fitting the body closely in a way that is sexually attractive: a slinky black dress
UK (of music or dancing) slow and suggesting sex: There's some very slinky dancing going on tonight!

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of women’s clothes) fitting the body closely: I like simple, slinky long dresses.
